ကြၽႏ္ုပ္တို႔AutoMart သည္ ခိုင္မာၿပီး လက္ရွိလုပ္ကိုင္ေနသည့္ ေမာ္ေတာ္ကား spare parts ႏွင့္ စက္ဆီ၊ ေခ်ာဆီျဖန႔္ျဖဴးေရး လုပ္ငန္းကို တိုးခ်ဲ႕၍ အြန္လိုင္းအေရာင္းဆိုင္(AutoMart Online Shop) ကို e-commerce နည္းပညာ၊ လြယ္ကူေသာေငြေပးေခ်မႈႏွင့္ ကြၽမ္းက်င္ေသာ အေရာင္းကိုယ္စားလွယ္မ်ားမွ တိုင္႐ိုက္ဆက္သြယ္ၿပီး ေရာင္းခ်လွ်က္ရွိပါသည္။ နည္းပညာအက်ိဳးေက်းဇူးေၾကာင့္ရရွိလာေသာ ျဖန႔္ခ်ီေရး ကုန္က်စရိတ္သက္သာမႈကို Online မွဝယ္ယူေသာ customerမ်ားကို ေက်းဇူးတုန႔္ျပန္ေသာအားျဖင့္ Tele sales, Online sales ႏွင့္ Online payment အားလုံးအတြက္ 5% discount ကိုေပးေနပါၿပီ။

Leading Online AutoParts Store in Myanmar
AUTOMART was established in 2015 and has become a leading e-commerce auto parts retailer of aftermarket automotive parts of premium quality and value brands such as ZF, Sachs, Lemforder, Bardahl, MANN, YUKO, ATM & Osram. We provide expert service through extensive parts knowledge, fast and friendly delivery, and an expansive inventory. Team AUTOMART organizes with well trained and experienced Sales Engineers, IT Technicians, Digital Marketing and Operation Team, Logistics and Inventory Associates, Admin and Finance Team ,Customer Service Representatives with their unique contributions they bring to the table to serve you better services.

Simple Shopping Experience
AUTOMART online catalogue carries famous brands of auto parts, lubricants and additives for vehicles of year 2000 to present, ensuring you’ll find the right parts, at the right time and at an unbeatable price guaranteed. Adding in a secure and easy online and conventional payment, AUTOMART provides a quick and easy shopping journey for Myanmar automotive professionals across the nation. Shopping with AUTOMART provides convenience and affordability that you won't find at your local parts store. You might see the same name-brand automotive products found in local auto parts stores, but at much lower prices. If you check out our large selection of car parts, accessories once, we're sure you will be back every time you have a need for great-quality parts.

Quick Shipping Nationwide
Taking the stress out of your auto parts purchase and getting you back on the road faster, we’ve strategically make your payment process and shipping quick and easy. Our sales and delivery teams are equipped with the latest technology, enabling us to ship hundreds of parcels per day with ease and expertise.

No:291, Byamaso Road, Quarter(6),
South Okapalapa Tsp, Yangon.

09 - 2222222222

admin@automart.com.mm

Mon - Sat 8:30AM To 6:00PM

AUTOMART recruits and works with three types of partners.
1. Service Partners, who carry our quality products for auto repair services at their workshops.Some of our partners are-
  • PaDaMyar Car Services
  • Alone Car Services & Spa
  • Inya Myine 22

    • 2. Retail Partners, who carry our quality products for resale at their retail shops.
    3. Promotion Partners, who work with us for sales and marketing activities, promotion and advertisement.
    4. Business Partners, who work with us as strategic partners for business.
